title: Apple Tells Suppliers IPhone Demand Slowing
itunes:title: Apple Tells Suppliers IPhone Demand Slowing
description:
Dr. Emily Gurley, epidemiologist at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, shares the latest news on the omicron variant. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Mark Gurman discusses Apple telling suppliers iPhone demand is slowing as the holidays arrive. Bloomberg News Investigative Reporter Greg Farrell talks about his Businessweek Magazine story Twenty Years After Enron, Investors Still Vulnerable to Fraud. Marsha Gray, Executive Director at the Christmas Tree Promotion Board, discusses the availability of real trees this holiday season. And We Drive to the Close with Brian Jacobsen, Senior Investment Strategist at Allspring Global Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
